00001 /*********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Name:         v1720.c
00004   Created by:   Pierre-A. Amaudruz / K.Olchanski

00006   Contents:     V1720 8 ch. 12bit 250Msps

00010 #include <stdio.h>
00011 #include <stdint.h>
00012 #include <string.h>
00013 #include "v1720drv.h"
00014 #include "mvmestd.h"
00015 
00016 // Buffer organization map for number of samples
00017 uint32_t V1720_NSAMPLES_MODE[11] = { (1<<20), (1<<19), (1<<18), (1<<17), (1<<16), (1<<15)
00018                                ,(1<<14), (1<<13), (1<<12), (1<<11), (1<<10)};
00019 
00020 /*****************************************************************/
00021 /*
00022 Read V1720 register value
00023 */
00024 static uint32_t regRead(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int offset)
00025 {
00026   mvme_set_am(mvme, MVME_AM_A32);
00027   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, MVME_DMODE_D32);
00028   return mvme_read_value(mvme, base + offset);
00029 }
00030 
00031 /*****************************************************************/
00032 /*
00033 Write V1720 register value
00034 */
00035 static void regWrite(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int offset, uint32_t value)
00036 {
00037   mvme_set_am(mvme, MVME_AM_A32);
00038   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, MVME_DMODE_D32);
00039   mvme_write_value(mvme, base + offset, value);
00040 }
00041 
00042 /*****************************************************************/
00043 uint32_t v1720_RegisterRead(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int offset)
00044 {
00045   return regRead(mvme, base, offset);
00046 }
00047 
00048 /*****************************************************************/
00049 void v1720_RegisterWrite(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int offset, uint32_t value)
00050 {
00051   regWrite(mvme, base, offset, value);
00052 }
00053 
00054 /*****************************************************************/
00055 void v1720_Reset(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base)
00056 {
00057   regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_SW_RESET, 0);
00058 }
00059 
00060 /*****************************************************************/
00061 void v1720_TrgCtl(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t reg, uint32_t mask)
00062 {
00063   regWrite(mvme, base, reg, mask);
00064 }
00065 
00066 /*****************************************************************/
00067 void v1720_ChannelCtl(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t reg, uint32_t mask)
00068 {
00069   regWrite(mvme, base, reg, mask);
00070 }
00071 
00072 /*****************************************************************/
00073 void v1720_ChannelSet(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t channel, uint32_t what, uint32_t that)
00074 {
00075   uint32_t reg, mask;
00076 
00077   if (what == V1720_CHANNEL_THRESHOLD)   mask = 0x0FFF;
00078   if (what == V1720_CHANNEL_OUTHRESHOLD) mask = 0x0FFF;
00079   if (what == V1720_CHANNEL_DAC)         mask = 0xFFFF;
00080   reg = what | (channel << 8);
00081   printf("base:0x%x reg:0x%x, this:%x\n", base, reg, that);
00082   regWrite(mvme, base, reg, (that & 0xFFF));
00083 }
00084 
00085 /*****************************************************************/
00086 uint32_t v1720_ChannelGet(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t channel, uint32_t what)
00087 {
00088   uint32_t reg, mask;
00089 
00090   if (what == V1720_CHANNEL_THRESHOLD)   mask = 0x0FFF;
00091   if (what == V1720_CHANNEL_OUTHRESHOLD) mask = 0x0FFF;
00092   if (what == V1720_CHANNEL_DAC)         mask = 0xFFFF;
00093   reg = what | (channel << 8);
00094   return regRead(mvme, base, reg);
00095 }
00096 
00097 /*****************************************************************/
00098 void v1720_ChannelThresholdSet(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t channel, uint32_t threshold)
00099 {
00100   uint32_t reg;
00101   reg = V1720_CHANNEL_THRESHOLD | (channel << 8);
00102   printf("base:0x%x reg:0x%x, threshold:%x\n", base, reg, threshold);
00103   regWrite(mvme, base, reg, (threshold & 0xFFF));
00104 }
00105 
00106 /*****************************************************************/
00107 void v1720_ChannelOUThresholdSet(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t channel, uint32_t threshold)
00108 {
00109   uint32_t reg;
00110   reg = V1720_CHANNEL_OUTHRESHOLD | (channel << 8);
00111   printf("base:0x%x reg:0x%x, outhreshold:%x\n", base, reg, threshold);
00112   regWrite(mvme, base, reg, (threshold & 0xFFF));
00113 }
00114 
00115 /*****************************************************************/
00116 void v1720_ChannelDACSet(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t channel, uint32_t dac)
00117 {
00118   uint32_t reg;
00119 
00120   reg = V1720_CHANNEL_DAC | (channel << 8);
00121   printf("base:0x%x reg:0x%x, DAC:%x\n", base, reg, dac);
00122   regWrite(mvme, base, reg, (dac & 0xFFFF));
00123 }
00124 
00125 /*****************************************************************/
00126 int v1720_ChannelDACGet(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t channel, uint32_t *dac)
00127 {
00128   uint32_t reg;
00129   int   status;
00130 
00131   reg = V1720_CHANNEL_DAC | (channel << 8);
00132   *dac = regRead(mvme, base, reg);
00133   reg = V1720_CHANNEL_STATUS | (channel << 8);
00134   status = regRead(mvme, base, reg);
00135   return status;
00136 }
00137 
00138 /*****************************************************************/
00139 void v1720_Align64Set(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base)
00140 {
00141   regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_VME_CONTROL, V1720_ALIGN64);
00142 }
00143 
00144 /*****************************************************************/
00145 void v1720_AcqCtl(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t operation)
00146 {
00147   uint32_t reg;
00148   
00149   reg = regRead(mvme, base, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL);  
00150   switch (operation) {
00151   case V1720_RUN_START:
00152     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg | 0x4));
00153     break;
00154   case V1720_RUN_STOP:
00155     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg & ~(0x4)));
00156     break;
00157   case V1720_REGISTER_RUN_MODE:
00158     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg & ~(0x3)));
00159     break;
00160   case V1720_SIN_RUN_MODE:
00161     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg | 0x01));
00162     break;
00163   case V1720_SIN_GATE_RUN_MODE:
00164     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg | 0x02));
00165     break;
00166   case V1720_MULTI_BOARD_SYNC_MODE:
00167     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg | 0x03));
00168     break;
00169   case V1720_COUNT_ACCEPTED_TRIGGER:
00170     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg | 0x08));
00171     break;
00172   case V1720_COUNT_ALL_TRIGGER:
00173     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg & ~(0x08)));
00174     break;
00175   default:
00176     break;
00177   }
00178 }
00179 
00180 /*****************************************************************/
00181 void v1720_ChannelConfig(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t operation)
00182 {
00183   uint32_t reg;
00184   
00185   regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG, 0x10);
00186   reg = regRead(mvme, base, V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG);  
00187   printf("Channel_config1: 0x%x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG));  
00188   switch (operation) {
00189   case V1720_TRIGGER_UNDERTH:
00190     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG, (reg | 0x40));
00191     break;
00192   case V1720_TRIGGER_OVERTH:
00193     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG, (reg & ~(0x40)));
00194     break;
00195   default:
00196     break;
00197   }
00198   printf("Channel_config2: 0x%x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG));  
00199 }
00200 
00201 /*****************************************************************/
00202 void v1720_info(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int *nchannels, uint32_t *n32word)
00203 {
00204   int i, chanmask;
00205 
00206   // Evaluate the event size
00207   // Number of samples per channels
00208   *n32word = V1720_NSAMPLES_MODE[regRead(mvme, base, V1720_BUFFER_ORGANIZATION)];
00209 
00210   // times the number of active channels
00211   chanmask = 0xff & regRead(mvme, base, V1720_CHANNEL_EN_MASK); 
00212   *nchannels = 0;
00213   for (i=0;i<8;i++) {
00214     if (chanmask & (1<<i))
00215       *nchannels += 1;
00216   }
00217 
00218   *n32word *= *nchannels;
00219   *n32word /= 2;   // 2 samples per 32bit word
00220   *n32word += 4;   // Headers
00221 }
00222 
00223 /*****************************************************************/
00224 uint32_t v1720_BufferOccupancy(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t channel)
00225 {
00226   uint32_t reg;
00227   reg = V1720_BUFFER_OCCUPANCY + (channel<<16);
00228   return regRead(mvme, base, reg);
00229 }
00230 
00231 
00232 /*****************************************************************/
00233 uint32_t v1720_BufferFree(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int nbuffer)
00234 {
00235   int mode;
00236 
00237   mode = regRead(mvme, base, V1720_BUFFER_ORGANIZATION);
00238   if (nbuffer <= (1<< mode) ) {
00239     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_BUFFER_FREE, nbuffer);
00240     return mode;
00241   } else
00242     return mode;
00243 }
00244 
00245 /*****************************************************************/
00246 uint32_t v1720_BufferFreeRead(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base)
00247 {
00248   return regRead(mvme, base, V1720_BUFFER_FREE);
00249 }
00250 
00251 /*****************************************************************/
00252 uint32_t v1720_DataRead(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t *pdata, uint32_t n32w)
00253 {
00254   uint32_t i;
00255 
00256   for (i=0;i<n32w;i++) {
00257     *pdata = regRead(mvme, base, V1720_EVENT_READOUT_BUFFER);
00258     //    printf ("pdata[%i]:%x\n", i, *pdata); 
00259 //    if (*pdata != 0xffffffff)
00260     pdata++;
00261     //    else
00262       //      break;
00263   }
00264   return i;
00265 }
00266 
00267 /********************************************************************/
00268 /** v1720_DataBlockRead
00269 Read N entries (32bit) 
00270 @param mvme vme structure
00271 @param base  base address
00272 @param pdest Destination pointer
00273 @return nentry
00274 */
00275 uint32_t v1720_DataBlockRead(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t *pdest, uint32_t *nentry)
00276 {
00277   int status;
00278 
00279   mvme_set_am(  mvme, MVME_AM_A32);
00280   mvme_set_dmode(  mvme, MVME_DMODE_D32);
00281   mvme_set_blt(  mvme, MVME_BLT_MBLT64);
00282   //  mvme_set_blt(  mvme, MVME_BLT_BLT32);
00283   //mvme_set_blt(  mvme, 0);
00284 
00285   // Transfer in MBLT64 (8bytes), nentry is in 32bits(VF48)
00286   // *nentry * 8 / 2
00287   status = mvme_read(mvme, pdest, base+V1720_EVENT_READOUT_BUFFER, *nentry<<2);
00288   if (status != MVME_SUCCESS)
00289     return 0;
00290 
00291   return (*nentry);
00292 }
00293 
00294 
00295 /*****************************************************************/
00296 void  v1720_Status(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base)
00297 {
00298   printf("================================================\n");
00299   printf("V1720 at A32 0x%x\n", (int)base);
00300   printf("Board ID             : 0x%x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1720_BOARD_ID));
00301   printf("Board Info           : 0x%x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1720_BOARD_INFO));
00302   printf("Acquisition status   : 0x%8.8x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1720_ACQUISITION_STATUS));
00303   printf("================================================\n");
00304 }
00305 
00306 /*****************************************************************/
00307 /**
00308 Sets all the necessary paramters for a given configuration.
00309 The configuration is provided by the mode argument.
00310 Add your own configuration in the case statement. Let me know
00311 your setting if you want to include it in the distribution.
00312 - <b>Mode 1</b> : 
00313 
00314 @param *mvme VME structure
00315 @param  base Module base address
00316 @param mode  Configuration mode number
00317 @return 0: OK. -1: Bad
00318 */
00319 int  v1720_Setup(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int mode)
00320 {
00321   switch (mode) {
00322   case 0x0:
00323     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00324     printf("Setup Skip\n");
00325     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00326   case 0x1:
00327     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00328     printf("Trigger from FP, 8ch, 1Ks, postTrigger 800\n");
00329     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00330     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_BUFFER_ORGANIZATION,  0x0A);    // 1K buffer
00331     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_TRIG_SRCE_EN_MASK,    0x4000);  // External Trigger
00332     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_CHANNEL_EN_MASK,      0xFF);    // 8ch enable
00333     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_POST_TRIGGER_SETTING, 800);     // PreTrigger (1K-800)
00334     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL,   0x00);   // Reset Acq Control
00335     printf("\n");
00336     break;
00337   case 0x2:
00338     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00339     printf("Trigger from LEMO\n");
00340     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00341     regWrite(mvme, base, V1720_BUFFER_ORGANIZATION, 1);
00342     printf("\n");
00343     break;
00344   default:
00345     printf("Unknown setup mode\n");
00346     return -1;
00347   }
00348   v1720_Status(mvme, base);
00349   return 0;
00350 }
00351 
00352 /*****************************************************************/
00353 /*-PAA- For test purpose only */
00354 #ifdef MAIN_ENABLE
00355 int main (int argc, char* argv[]) {
00356 
00357   uint32_t V1720_BASE  = 0x32100000;
00358 
00359   MVME_INTERFACE *myvme;
00360 
00361   uint32_t data[100000], n32word, n32read;
00362   int status, channel, i, j, nchannels=0, chanmask;
00363 
00364   if (argc>1) {
00365     sscanf(argv[1],"%x", &V1720_BASE);
00366   }
00367 
00368   // Test under vmic
00369   status = mvme_open(&myvme, 0);
00370 
00371   v1720_Setup(myvme, V1720_BASE, 1);
00372   // Run control by register
00373   v1720_AcqCtl(myvme, V1720_BASE, V1720_REGISTER_RUN_MODE);
00374   // Soft or External trigger
00375   v1720_TrgCtl(myvme, V1720_BASE, V1720_TRIG_SRCE_EN_MASK     , V1720_SOFT_TRIGGER|V1720_EXTERNAL_TRIGGER);
00376   // Soft and External trigger output
00377   v1720_TrgCtl(myvme, V1720_BASE, V1720_FP_TRIGGER_OUT_EN_MASK, V1720_SOFT_TRIGGER|V1720_EXTERNAL_TRIGGER);
00378   // Enabled channels
00379   v1720_ChannelCtl(myvme, V1720_BASE, V1720_CHANNEL_EN_MASK, 0x3);
00380   //  sleep(1);
00381 
00382   channel = 0;
00383   // Start run then wait for trigger
00384   v1720_AcqCtl(myvme, V1720_BASE, V1720_RUN_START);
00385   sleep(1);
00386 
00387   //  regWrite(myvme, V1720_BASE, V1720_SW_TRIGGER, 1);
00388 
00389   // Evaluate the event size
00390   // Number of samples per channels
00391   n32word  =  1<<regRead(myvme, V1720_BASE, V1720_BUFFER_ORGANIZATION);
00392   // times the number of active channels
00393   chanmask = 0xff & regRead(myvme, V1720_BASE, V1720_CHANNEL_EN_MASK); 
00394   for (i=0;i<8;i++) 
00395     if (chanmask & (1<<i))
00396       nchannels++;
00397   printf("chanmask : %x , nchannels:  %d\n", chanmask, nchannels);
00398   n32word *= nchannels;
00399   n32word /= 2;   // 2 samples per 32bit word
00400   n32word += 4;   // Headers
00401   printf("n32word:%d\n", n32word);
00402 
00403   printf("Occupancy for channel %d = %d\n", channel, v1720_BufferOccupancy(myvme, V1720_BASE, channel)); 
00404 
00405   do {
00406     status = regRead(myvme, V1720_BASE, V1720_ACQUISITION_STATUS);
00407     printf("Acq Status1:0x%x\n", status);
00408   } while ((status & 0x8)==0);
00409   
00410   n32read = v1720_DataRead(myvme, V1720_BASE, &(data[0]), n32word);
00411   printf("n32read:%d\n", n32read);
00412   
00413   for (i=0; i<n32read;i+=4) {
00414     printf("[%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x\n"
00415            , i, data[i], i+1, data[i+1], i+2, data[i+2], i+3, data[i+3]);
00416   }
00417   
00418   do {
00419     status = regRead(myvme, V1720_BASE, V1720_ACQUISITION_STATUS);
00420     printf("Acq Status2:0x%x\n", status);
00421   } while ((status & 0x8)==0);
00422   
00423   n32read = v1720_dataRead(myvme, V1720_BASE, &(data[0]), n32word);
00424   printf("n32read:%d\n", n32read);
00425   
00426   for (i=0; i<n32read;i+=4) {
00427     printf("[%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x\n"
00428            , i, data[i], i+1, data[i+1], i+2, data[i+2], i+3, data[i+3]);
00429   }
00430   
00431   
00432   //  v1720_AcqCtl(myvme, V1720_BASE, RUN_STOP);
00433   
00434   regRead(myvme, V1720_BASE, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL);
00435   status = mvme_close(myvme);
00436 
00437   return 1;
00438 
00439 }
00440 #endif
